tasks.build: deno task buildStatic && deno task buildScripts
tasks.watch: deno task buildStatic && deno run --allow-read=./src --allow-write=./dist --allow-net=deno.land build.ts --watch
tasks.devServer: deno task buildStatic && deno run --allow-read=./src,./dist --allow-write=./dist --allow-net=0.0.0.0:8080,deno.land --allow-sys=networkInterfaces build.ts --watch --serve
